mapper.select:
select
,IC_TopupOrder.CardNO AS CardNO from IC_WX_Refund LEFT JOIN IC_TopupOrder ON IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO = IC_WX_Refund.OrderNO
and IC_WX_Refund.RefundOrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_WX_Refund.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_WX_Refund.UnionId like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.CardNO like '%${auditRemark}%' and IC_WX_Refund.RefundTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and IC_WX_Refund.RefundTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by RefundTime desc
Offset ${offset} Row Fetch Next ${limit} Rows Only

select count(*) from IC_WX_Refund
LEFT JOIN IC_TopupOrder ON IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO = IC_WX_Refund.OrderNO
and IC_WX_Refund.RefundOrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_WX_Refund.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_WX_Refund.UnionId like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.CardNO like '%${auditRemark}%'
